maxNumberPlots.description: Maximum number of sensor plots Joule can show.

autoFilter.description: Object to specifiy max power values before auto discarding data outside limits.

plotColour.description: Array of SVG colours for the individual plots. Must be same length as max-number-plots.

sensorNoAverage.description: Array of sensors not to add to average calculations.

sensorIgnore.description: Array of sensors to completely ignore.

indexUrl.description: URL of the JSON index file for the sensors.

errorUrl.description: URL of the JSON error file for the sensors.

sensorFilesUrl.description: URL of the root of the dir structure containing the sensor data.
